long_description: Ideal for done-in-a-day alpine routes, the streamlined Patagonia Ascensionist 25L Pack is perfect for everything from long granite ascents in the Bugaboos to a day-push on El Capitan. Streamlined shape keeps the pack out of the way while climbing with a harness and rack of gear. Asymmetrical spindrift collar opens wide for easy packing; drawcord simultaneously cinches collar and closes lid for a secure seal. Adjustable ice axe loops offer a multitude of carry options. Daisy chains on front and side panels provide lashing options. The Patagonia Ascensionist 25L Pack features a zippered pocket on lid that provides easy access to small items.
short_description: Ideal for done-in-a-day alpine routes, the streamlined Patagonia Ascensionist 25L Pack is perfect for everything from long granite ascents in the Bugaboos to a day-push on El Capitan.
